DOC.brief_summary: This randomized sham-controlled double-blind study test hypothesis transcranial static magnetic field stimulation ( tSMS ) motor cortex improve levodopa-induced dyskinesia patient Parkinson 's disease . Half patient receive real tSMS treatment , half receive sham treatment ( placebo ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Levodopa-induced Dyskinesias Transcranial Static Magnetic Field Stimulation ( tSMS )
DOC.criteria: advanced idiopathic Parkinson 's disease ( Brain Bank criterion ) optimal clinical response dopaminergic medication ( > 30 % UPDRSIII improvement ) presence clinically relevant levodopainduced peakdose dyskinesia least one upper limb MRIincompatible metal object body ( e.g . cardiac pacemaker ) main neuropsychiatric comorbidity
